text: Frederick Derek Randall (born 5 February 1864, date of death unknown) was a British track and field athlete who competed at the 1900 Summer Olympics in Paris, France. Randall competed in the marathon. He was one of six runners who did not finish the race. ==References== * De Wael, Herman. Herman's Full Olympians: "Athletics 1900". Accessed 18 March 2006. Available electronically at . * Category:1864 births Category:Year of death missing Category:British male marathon runners Category:Olympic athletes of Great Britain Category:Athletes (track and field) at the 1900 Summer Olympics
title: Frederick Randall
